channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Patriots Owner Robert Kraft Reportedly Fails to Make Pro Football Hall of Fame
item.description: Patriots owner Robert Kraft has reportedly joined former New England head coach Bill Belichick in Hall of Fame rejection.

item.title: Giants Reportedly Hire Former Chiefs OC Matt Nagy as Offensive Coordinator
item.description: The Giants are reportedly hiring former Chiefs offensive coordinator Matt Nagy as their new offensive coordinator.

item.title: Patriots DC Terrell Williams on Being Cancer-Free: 'It's Been Joyous For Me'
item.description: New England Patriots DC Terrell Williams battled prostate cancer, inspiring his team with positive leadership throughout it all.

item.title: Ranking the Patriots' 12 Most Important Moves to Reach Super Bowl LX
item.description: The Patriots pulled off the NFL's biggest turnaround this season. We rank their biggest acquisitions en route to the Super Bowl.

item.title: Ranking the Seahawks' 12 Most Important Moves to Reach Super Bowl LX
item.description: The Seahawks have been the best team in football for much of this season. We rank their biggest acquisitions en route to the Super Bowl.

item.title: Sources: Bucks countering trade offers for Giannis
item.description: The Bucks have submitted counteroffers to teams aggressively seeking a trade for two-time MVP Giannis Antetokounmpo, sources told ESPN.

item.title: Clippers, Harden exploring trade, sources say
item.description: The LA Clippers and James Harden are exploring trades ahead of Thursday's deadline, with the Cavaliers one of the teams expressing interest.

item.title: Sources: Giants to hire Nagy as Harbaugh's OC
item.description: The Giants will hire Matt Nagy as their offensive coordinator, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

item.title: Sources: Kraft not selected for HOF Class of 2026
item.description: Patriots owner Robert Kraft, like his former head coach Bill Belichick, was not selected for entry into this year's Pro Football Hall of Fame class, s...

item.title: Vonn (ACL) 'confident' she'll compete at Olympics
item.description: American skier Lindsey Vonn is "confident" she'll race at the Milan Cortina Winter Olympics despite suffering ACL and meniscus injuries to her left kn...
